job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: ltpgtthis data analyst will be responsible for collecting analyzing and offers transparency into customer behavior and business performanceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtessential duties and responsibilities include but not limited toltpgtltpgt strong analytic skills and ability to develop dashboard and reports using tableau to enable customers to analyze data and make business decisionsltpgtltpgt ability to work iteratively and converts business requirements quick prototypes with different visualization optionsltpgtltpgt ability to understand core business questions needing answeredltpgtltpgt ability to write custom calculations or queries within the data visualization tool tableaultpgtltpgt solid understanding of tableau presentation and data layer and implementation of security with tableaultpgtltpgt experience in rolling out tableau as selfservice solution for large number of usersltpgtltpgt hands on experience in tableau reporting tableau server managementltpgtltpgt experience in building integration of tableau with like ms sqlltpgtltpgt ability to consult business users to build tableau dashboardsltpgtltulgtltligt this role will require collaboration with end users project stakeholders and support partners to identify needs goals metric measurements and business models which will result in easytounderstand interfaces and enable end users to quickly identify key themes within the dataltligtltulgt
